thread.title: Billy Crain
thread.title_full: Disc Makers reviewed by Billy Crain

author: Billy Crain
title: Billy Crain
text: I was recommended to Disc Makers by a friend in 2009 when I decided to release my first solo CD. I originally met with someone in the Nashville office and they helped walk me through the whole process. Fast forward 7 years and I have just released my 5th solo CD. The quality has always been perfect, it's actually very easy for a non-tech guy like me to order online, and everything arrives as promised. I've been approached by other companies but I'm sold on Disc Makers!!!
